reviewText: Major disappointment - I would not have expected Playboy to make such an awful video.

Features 5 scenes: Starts with gals flashing guys jumping cycles over ramps, then two gals polish a cycle and disrobe, then they smear what appears to be oil on each other and kiss.

Gals go into a cycle shop then go home and lap dance on each other. The gals from earlier get into a tub.

Concludes with gals and a device and chat as they disrobe and tan. Occasionally entertaining.

I like the Playboy Exposed series a lot because not only are there plenty of sexy ladies in them, as you would expect from Playboy, but also the Exposed DVDs are usually done in a more realistic way, kind of a reality TV style and less posing than on most Playboy DVDs, although there are exceptions both ways. On the other hand, sometimes with the Exposed DVDs the camerawork is not as professional, but in the case of GIRLS OF MOTORCROSS the camerawork is overall very good. Sometimes the cameras wander a bit much or are too close-up for my taste, but very well done overall. There are five great-looking girls here in various scenarios, but oddly they're never shown riding motorcycles! I don't know why this doesn't have some scenes of the girls riding nude like in Playboy's great X Mates series, Playboy: X Mates, Vol. 1 - BMX/Wakeboards and Playboy X Mates 2. The opening scene shows them out on a motorcross field, watching guys ride, with the girls sometimes topless but not showing them much, actually. Then two of the girls are shown cleaning motorcycles in a repair shop, but their attention wanders as they strip naked and begin caressing each other. This is a really hot segment! Then the three other girls are in a bike shop looking around, after which they go home to lie in the sun, again shedding their inhibitions. There are great shots of the three of them sunning, and the super-stacked girl is in this one too. Of course, the girls get carried away and spread suntan lotion on each other to make for another very sexy scene. Then there's a short bathtub scene with the first two girls again, and a scene with the tanning girls getting dressed and then undressed again as they do a sexy strip tease for each other. Nothing X-rated here though, strictly R. But what's happened to the motorcycles? Who cares? The whole DVD runs about 55 minutes, with extras being a decent photo gallery and previews of other Playboy Exposed DVDs. This is a very worthwhile DVD, one of the sexiest I've seen in the Exposed series, but Playboy is in the process of combining these Exposed series 2-on-1 DVD, which is more economical. But who knows when they'll get around to this one, so you might not want to wait as it could disappear entirely!
